basics.label: Route Manager
basics.summary: Goal oriented, self-motivated with twenty years of experience as a Supervisor/Manager of personnel, products, and budgets. Driven to tackle projects that advance the organization and build collaboration/teamwork among peers and subordinates.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Built a steady repeat customer base by providing a quality product and exceptional customer service. Maintained inventory levels along with current product knowledge daily.
highlights: Completed daily reconciliations, recorded and made deposits of up to $1500.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Analyze reporting data to identify areas of opportunity and provide solutions to maximize performance potential and profitability. Coach, mentor, and direct team members of varying levels of experience in support of departmental objectives.
highlights: Ensure adherence to company safety guidelines through education, training, and monitoring of daily in-field performance.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Monitor and manage technician productivity to ensure compliance with MasTec and DirectTV policies and procedures.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provide satellite installations and service work for DirecTV customers. Conduct quality control inspections on installations and service work done by all technicians.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Maintained a $1.5 million dollar budget and managed plant operations of 35 employees in seven departments through hiring, firing, payroll, training and developing job skills.
highlights: Coordinated contracting issues with vendors daily.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Specialized in company wide inventory management and control through the design of computerized stockrooms and assisting in software design upgrades.
highlights: Managed monthly projects averaging $150,000 to include building stockrooms, hiring and monitoring contractors and negotiating with vendors.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed $5 million plant operations and supervised 40 employees. Served as Safety Committee Chairman, insuring OSHA compliance.
